# Part 1

```{r}
seats <- input %>%
  str_replace_all("B", "1") %>%
  str_replace_all("F", "0") %>%
  str_replace_all("R", "1") %>%
  str_replace_all("L", "0") %>%
  strtoi(2)
max(seats)
```
